long_description: The Marmot Limelight 2 tent offers 2 backpackers a comfortable space and tough, yet lightweight construction. The Limelight also offers great value as it comes complete with footprint and gear loft! Large side door provides convenient access for campers; 1 large vestibule holds all the gear. Color coded poles and webbing simplify setup; snag-free zipper flap won't get hung up. DAC Pressfit aluminum poles feature a pressed-in ferrule, ensuring the poles remain strong and reliable. DAC/Marmot double clips disperse stress over a large area and won't slide; plus, they have an incredible breaking strength and are easy to use with gloves. UV-resistant, seam-sealed polyester rainfly won't stretch or expand when wet, ensuring a consistently taut pitch. Catenary cut floor provides a tight pitch with reduced weight; fully seam-taped bathtub floor maintains waterproofness. Window Weld(TM) design gives views to the outside, lets in light and reduces weight; fly vent increases air circulation inside tent. Light-reflective points help you find your tent at night; jingle-free nylon zipper pulls remain quiet in windy weather. Multiple inside pockets organize your equipment and provide storage up off the floor while inside the Limelight 2 tent. As a convenient option, poles and rainfly can be set up with the footprint to create a lightweight shelter.
